resources.string: Sorry, you don\'t have sufficient permission to use this app. Please contact your account administrator.
The phone you assigned in Settings \nwill ring now. Please pick up to complete \nthe connection.
Cannot place the call since there is no connection to server. Please try again later.
An error occurred while attempting to complete your request. Please try again later.
An error occurred while attempting to complete your request. Would you like to try again?
The Caller ID you selected is not available now, please choose another one and try again.
The Caller ID you selected is not available now, please try again.
This number is already in your contacts and favorites list.
Please log in using your Direct Number to use this RingOut mode.
Directory Enquiry calls are not allowed in RingOut Mode. Please enable Outbound VoIP in the app settings to make such calls.
This call is not allowed in RingOut Mode. Please enable Outbound VoIP in the app settings to make such calls.
Calls to this service are not supported. Please dial the number directly from your landline or cell phone.
The phone you assigned in Settings will ring now. Please pick up to complete the connection.
Your phone line is busy. Please try again.
Your phone does not answer. Please try again.
Error occurred calling your current location.
Too low balance on the account.
Caller ID not available, please try again later.
First party connected. Your party\'s phone is busy. Please try again.
First party connected. There\'s no answer from your party\'s phone. Please try again.
First party connected. Your party has rejected the call.
Choose the audio source you would like to listen from.

An error occurred while attempting to complete your request (airplane mode). Please try again later.
Network is not available. Please try again later.

Call log is updating, please try again later.
Create a contact before adding to favorites.
Do you want to delete selected contact(s)?
There is no text-to-%1$s service available. Make a voice call to %2$s or use another means to contact the services.
There is no fax-to-%1$s service available. Make a voice call to %2$s or use another means to contact the services.
Are you sure you want to delete this message? This message will be permanently deleted from your account.
Are you sure you want to delete these messages? These messages will be permanently deleted from your account.
Are you sure you want to clear all messages? All messages will be permanently deleted from your account.
Create a contact before adding to favorites.
You cannot callback this message. Please specify the recipient.
SD card is used as a mass storage, or is not mounted, or is write protected.
Cannot playback message without an SD card
Cannot load message without an SD card
Cannot load fax without an SD card
Message not downloaded yet. Please try again later
The SD card is unmounted, please make sure it is mounted and try again.
This text will be sent as individual messages. To send as a group message, all participants must be a part of your Company Directory.
This text will be sent as individual messages.
Are you sure you want to delete the selected message? This message will be permanently deleted from your account.
Pasted text has been truncated: your message cannot exceed 1000 characters.
You cannot input more than 1000 characters.
Sorry, you cannot forward more than 1000 characters in a text message.
Sorry, you can only add up to %d recipients.
You cannot join this conference when you are in an Android phone call, please try again later.
Are you sure you want to join this conference?\n(Note the participant access code will be entered automatically.)
Choose a dial-in number to join the conference. (Participant access code is entered automatically.)
Are you sure you want to join this conference?\n(Note you must manually enter the access code \"%1$s\" after the call is connected. If you want to join with 1-tap, please enable VoIP calling.)
Are you sure you want to join this conference? (Note the participant access code will be entered automatically.)
Choose a dial-in number to join the conference. When connected, enter the participant access code. (To join with \'1-tap\', enable VoIP calling.)
Are you sure you want to join this conference? VoIP will be turned on if you choose to continue.\n(Note the participant access code will be entered automatically.)
Choose a dial-in number to join the conference. VoIP will be turned on. (Participant access code is entered automatically.)
The extension you are using cannot make outgoing calls. Please contact your account administrator to change permissions for this extension.
Cannot change dial-in number since there is no connection to server.Please try again later.
Failed to change dial-in number.Please try again later.
No Caller ID data. Please try again later.
Please enter your mobile device number:
Invalid phone number. Please try again.

This app is set to be launched by default for certain actions such as:

● Placing phone calls when you use the Android dialer

● Importing documents such as PDFs
This app is set to be launched by default for certain actions such as:\n\n● Importing documents such as PDFs
This app is not currently set to launch by default for any actions.
No browser found. Please install browser.
No map application found. Please install map application.
There is no email application installed in this device, or the email application had been disabled. Please install an email application and make sure it is enabled.
Turn ON to allow this app to place phone calls when you are using Android dialer.
Your request could not be completed since there is no connection to server. Please try again later.
Cannot change DND status since there is no connection to server. Please try again later.
Please enter all of the required information before continuing.
Cannot download deleted message. You can access it via service web Deleted Messages screen
Are you sure you want to delete this message? This message will be permanently deleted from your account.
Are you sure you want to delete the messages in this thread? These messages will be permanently deleted from your account.
Do Not Accept Call Queue Calls
With VoIP Calling on, make and receive calls using your Wi-Fi or cellular data connection.
When VoIP is turned off, outgoing calls will be connected to you through your RingOut number.
Calls you at the phone you select below first, and when you answer, calls your party.
When there is no Wi-Fi connectivity, calls will be connected using cellular data.
When there is no Wi-Fi connectivity, outgoing calls will be connected using your cellular voice minutes (RingOut).
Calls will be connected using your cellular voice minutes (RingOut).
Requires you to enter \"1\" before the call is connected to your party.
Invalid phone number or password. Please try again.
You have been logged out after a period of inactivity. Please log back in.
Your login number or password is no longer valid. You will be logged out of this account. Please login with your new account info and try again.
We\'re sorry, your call cannot be completed as dialed. Please check the number and try again.
Entered extension is not present in your account\'s extensions. Please check the number and try again.
The extension you are using cannot make outgoing calls. Please contact your account administrator to change permissions for this extension.
The extension you are using cannot send text messages. Please contact your account administrator to change permissions for this extension.
To establish another active call please end one of your active calls.
Your call cannot be completed at this time. VoIP calling is not turned on. Would you like to turn it on and continue the call?
Please enter your phone number in RingOut Settings
Sorry, international calling is not available for free or trial accounts. To enable international calling, please upgrade your account to a paid plan.
Sorry, international calling is not available for free or trial accounts. To switch this call to an international number, please upgrade your account to a paid plan.
Sorry, international faxing is not available for free or trial accounts. To enable international faxing, please upgrade your account to a paid plan.
Sorry, your account is not enabled for international calling. Please contact your administrator to enable international calling for the country and destination you would like to reach.
Sorry, your account is not enabled for international calling. Please contact your administrator to enable international calling for the country of your device phone number.
Sorry, your account is not enabled for international calling and faxing. Please contact your administrator to enable international calling for the country and destination you would like to reach.
The extension you are using cannot change presence status. Please contact your account administrator to change permissions for this extension.
The extension you are using cannot send text messages. Please contact your account administrator to change permissions for this extension.
This will re-synchronize all messages in this app. No data will be lost.
Messages cannot be re-synchronized without network connection, please check your network connectivity and try again.
You have text messages and faxes sending in progress, the sending will be aborted if you choose to force re-synchronize now. Are you sure you want to continue?
You have faxes sending in progress, the sending will be aborted if you choose to force re-synchronize now. Are you sure you want to continue?
You have text messages sending in progress, the sending will be aborted if you choose to force re-synchronize now. Are you sure you want to continue?
No valid phone number(s) to make a call
No email address for this record
Please input a valid email address.
A new contact requires at least one of the following: first name, last name, company, or a phone number.

Your contact has been imported to %s cloud server.
You have exceeded the maximum phone numbers you can add to a contact. Please delete one phone number from it or add it to another contact.
You have exceeded the maximum email addresses you can add to a contact. Please delete one email address from it or add it to another contact.

The recipient does not accept text messages.
Messaging to international numbers is not allowed.

Your account does not support text messaging. Please contact your account administrator.
The recipient number is not valid.
Cannot send further messages until first message in this conversation is delivered.

Sorry, we are having issues connecting your device to our server. You can make and receive VoIP calls normally, but cannot send or receive messages, refresh your call log, or make RingOut calls at this time.
Sorry, we are having issues connecting your device to our server. You can make and receive calls normally, but cannot send or receive messages or refresh your call log at this time.
No application in the system to perform this operation

You had installed \"%1$s\" in this device. With \"%2$s\" you can use your business identity by default when making Android phone calls. Would you like to use \"%2$s\" as your default for Android phone calls and replace \"%1$s\"? (You can also change this setting in \"Application Settings -> Default Launching\".)

Call to this service is not available.

Failed to open page, please try again later.
A new version %1$s is available (you have %2$s). Please install the update.
A new version %1$s is available. Prior versions are no longer supported (you have %2$s). Please install the update to continue using this app.
Sorry, no %1$s app is installed or it was disabled in your device. Please check the app status in device \"Settings\", or install a new %1$s app.
To protect your company and personal data in this application, your account administrator has enabled data encryption. The data will now be migrated; this is mandatory and may take a few minutes.
Tap Start to begin. Once migration has begun, do not close this app. Leave the app in the foreground during the entire migration process.
You will not be able to use this app or any features provided by this app, such as receiving or placing calls, texts and faxes, until this operation has completed.
Your account administrator has disabled data encryption for this application. The data will now be migrated. This is mandatory and may take a few minutes.
Please charge your battery to above 5% and leave your charger plugged in.
Please turn on your internet connection.
The operation failed to complete. Please reinstall the app, or contact your system administrator for assistance.
The operation failed to complete, because there is not enough storage available. Please free up storage, and launch the app again.

Unable to remove logs. Please try again later.

Your App Language is currently set as %s. Your cover page will now be updated to match your App Language.

The requested page cannot be loaded. Please check your network connection and try again later.

Sorry, phone number is required to place a call.

To allow you to receive 911 callbacks, VoIP over WiFi/3G/4G has been turned on.

Sorry, we\' re having issues connecting your device to the VoIP server. VoIP calling is unavailable at this time. If you are using Wi-Fi, please ensure the firewall settings on your wireless router allow VoIP connections. Also, please check your 3G/4G/LTE or Wi-Fi signal strength.

VoIP calling is prohibited in this country. To make or receive VoIP calls, please log in from a different location or proceed to make your call using RingOut. To stop receiving this notification, please turn off the VoIP Calling setting.
VoIP calling is unavailable at this time. Would you like to place a RingOut call instead? The call will be initiated through your phone\'s dialer.
VoIP calling is unavailable at this time. Would you like to place a RingOut call instead? The call will be initiated through %1$s.

VoIP calling is prohibited in this country. To make VoIP calls, please log in from a different location or proceed to make your call using RingOut.\n\nInternational and roaming charges may apply when using RingOut outside of your home country. Please check with your mobile carrier.

VoIP calling is prohibited in this country. VoIP Calling is available in the current location.

The new battery optimization settings in Android will prevent your %1$s app from receiving incoming calls and message notifications when your device goes into Doze or App Standby mode.

To ensure you will continue to receive incoming calls and message notifications, please select \"Yes\" on the next screen to let the %2$s app stay connected in the background.
Message your team, assign tasks, share files and create events now.
Sorry, we have trouble updating the photo, please check your network connection and try again.
%s doesn\'t have access to your phone. If you want to use RingOut, go to Permissions and turn it on.
%s doesn\'t have access to your Android phone module. If you want to enable \"Call From Android Dialer\", go to Permissions and turn it on.
%s doesn\'t have access to your microphone. If you want to use the microphone, go to Permissions and turn it on.
%s doesn\'t have access to your storage. If you want to access your voicemail or fax, go to Permissions and turn it on.
%s doesn\'t have access to your storage. If you want to encrypt/decrypt your files, go to Permissions and turn it on.
%s doesn\'t have access to your storage. If you want to take photos, go to Permissions and turn it on.
%1$s doesn\'t have access to your storage. If you want to import files to the %2$s app, go to Permissions and turn it on.
%1$s doesn\'t have access to your storage. If you want to send app log to %2$s, go to Permissions and turn it on.
%s doesn\'t have access to your contacts. If you want to see your contacts, go to Permissions and turn it on.
We need to access your %s so people can hear you during calls.
We need to access your %s so you can make calls.
We need to access your %s so you can download voicemail and faxes.
We need to access your %s so you can see them in the app.
Your account settings are on the way
You are exiting your %1s cloud settings. Please make sure you have saved any changes you have made before you continue.

In our efforts to continuously protect your account, we have instituted a new security policy. You now need to maintain a password with letters and numbers in addition to a numeric PIN, which will be used to log in to your account from a desktop IP phone. Please change your password by %1$s to avoid any login issues.

Your password is not compliant with our new security policy. For your account security, you will not be able to log in until you change your password and set a new numeric PIN. Please change your password and then log into the app again.
Sorry, we have issues to set your region, please tap \"Retry\" to try again or tap \"Cancel\" to log out.

Sorry, we have issues to get your region, please tap "Retry" to try again or tap "Cancel" to log out.
